channel.title: How to make a Duel Arena ? [Delta]
channel.description:
I tried a lot of time and it didn't work. I want the code of when you arrive to the duel arena, you got a duel near your name to duel people because I don't know how to do this. Also, I don't know how to show up the interface for the armour to duel and what to stake. Can someone help me please ?
Thanks.

item.title: How to make a Duel Arena ? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

ry60003333 Is completely right. As for there not being a tutorial in the tutorial section. You cant tell me that there isnt a tutorial in a tutorial section somewhere? I know there is at least one for deltascape (which blows anyways) on a rival site.

Please dont ever use the words[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:3, topic:292950”]Just give me some codes for it please, my server needs this. Please, I looked and there’s no tutorial.[/quote] Because no one can do this for you and they would be a fool to even try. Start with something small and work your way up.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a Duel Arena ? [Delta]

item.title: How to make a Duel Arena ? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Alright, thanks Ry. If there were a Duel Arena tutorial in Tutorial section, I would be happy.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a Duel Arena ? [Delta]

item.title: How to make a Duel Arena ? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

These are the kinds of things that can’t be spoonfed to people; their mouths would explode.

Being a programmer means turning ideas into code. People can’t program for you because they need your exact code in front of them to do it, as each server (no matter how terrible the code is) is different.

This is why many topics in the help section get no replies, you people are not programmers.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

You don’t need a tutorial. Go test stuff. Go step by step in adding it. Ok, so first I need the option to challenge to show up, than I need this and that. You’ll get it.

item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

I can’t just give you codes. It depends on the source. Here is a link to a source with 100% duel arena already coded into it. You could use this and start coding it. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,340002.0.html

item.title: How to make a Duel Arena ? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

It is just like adding “Trade with”. It is very difficult to explain and you have to know how to code very well to add this. There MIGHT be a tutorial somewhere on here but you will have to find it. Otherwise, get a friend or find someone who can code really well to do it for you. I would do it for you but I’m making my own ATM.

Read full topic
